name: Data Scientist (BigData)
description:
We are looking for a Senior Data Scientist to become a part of the data science team empowering RingCentral management and customers to choose correct decisions based on the data processing including but not limited to data analysis, predictions and recommendation, fraud detection, etc.

Key responsibilities:

  • Creating, training, and testing ML/AI models for a variety of business problems being responsible from scratch to production optimization and rolling out.
  • Selecting features, building and optimizing classifiers using machine learning techniques
  • Exploring, cleaning, and enriching data to be used for reporting and modeling.
  • Preparing data sources that can be used by other members and teams to produce reports.
  • Providing all kinds of work artifacts via Wiki, Jira, and Git.
  • Creating reports and presentations for the business.

Skills & Requirements:

  • Hands-on experience in ML/AI, predictive analytics, and statistics for more than 2+ years.
  • Solid knowledge in Python, SQL, and hands-on experience to use it for ML/AI.
  • Familiarity with analytics platforms (e.g., Tableau)
  • Advance degree in math, physics, computer science, engineering, or similar.
  • Familiarity with relational, non-relational, graph, and other databases.
  • Comfortable working in Linux shell.
  • Upper-Intermediate English or above.
  • Hands-on experience with Wiki (Confluence), Jira, and Git.

Would be a plus:

  • Ph.D. in Mathematics.
  • Experience with Hadoop and Big Data technologies.
  • Experience with Enterprise analytics and BI.
  • Team leadership experience.
  • Curiosity, strongly analytical, and problem-solving skills.

Conditions:

  • Well coordinated professional team.
  • A remote work format is possible.
  • Cutting edge technologies, interesting and challenging tasks, dynamic project, great opportunities for self-realization, professional and career growth.
  • Corporate training programs, English language courses.
  • Business trips to foreign branch offices (the USA, China) and further work H1-B U.S.
  • Job placement and payment of salary take place according to the labor code.
  • Sick leaves 100% paid.
  • 28 day vacation 100% paid in accordance with the current salary.
  • Office in 10-minute walk from the subway.
  • Nonresident applicants are granted Relocation Bonus.
